name: Make sure it makes you happy
description:
"What ever you decide to do make sure it makes you happy" Large 2.25" Pinback Button, pocket mirror or magnet!.

This listing is for ONE large 2.25", use the drop down menu to choose a pinback button or pocket mirror and don't forget to pick an option A or B.

You can pick the X & O style using the drop down menu! We can customize the X & O Styles, just contact us. The Xs & Os are 1.5" magnets, durable and feature a mylar covering.

name: 50 Custom 2.25" Inch Pinbacks
description:
This listing is for FIFTY custom made 2.25" pinback buttons. You can have whatever you like on these pins, be creative!

Please leave your details in the notes to seller, email me the file/picture you want:
orders [!at] bayleafbuttons.com

File Requirements:
300 DPI
I accept the following formats: .TIFF, .JPG, .EPS, .AI, & .PSD, .PDF

Templates can be found on our website here: http://bayleafbuttons.com/custom.html

We will not press any buttons until you have approved the proof which we will email/convo to you ASAP! Any other questions about the file requirements or what design options we can do for you just ask!

As always our buttons are 2.25", printed on 20lb Paper with a professional printer, they also have a Mylar covering to prevent damage to the image. Last two images show the back of the buttons and a ruler for size comparison.

This item is great for family reunions, weddings or for a party!

name: Vinyl Labels for Kitchen Jars & Canister
description:
NEW!! Super chic kitchen vinyl labels!

These decals are perfect for smooth jar surfaces, like the above jars!

This listing is for ONE decal, please use the drop down menu to pick your preferred decal colour and option. The size is approximately 4 13/16" wide x 4 1/2" tall.

>*>Default colours are Glossy Black, and Glossy White. Matte option is available please contact us: orders@bayleafbuttons.com

Your order will come with pieces for testing, installation instructions as well as a squeegee for easy application! Need the decal to say something else, contact us we'd love to make a custom decal for you!!!

Please note: Our vinyl hasn't been thoroughly tested for wall use and is mainly for use on smooth flat surfaces. We cannot be held responsible for any damage that may occur upon removing the decal from walls.

The decals are removable but cannot be reused once they have been removed. To remove a vinyl decals simply heat the decal to help loosen the adhesive and peel gently away from surface.

Please note: Our vinyl hasn't been thoroughly tested for wall use and is mainly for use on flat surfaces. We cannot be held responsible for any damage that may occur upon removing the decal from walls.
The decals are removable but cannot be reused once they have been removed. To remove a vinyl decals simply heat the decal to help loosen the adhesive and peel gently away from surface.
